channel.title: How can i add dragon plate and dragon Claws to a Client?
channel.description:
Hey guys! (IM a Noob at coding) I was wondering how i can add a dragon platebody and dragon claws to my client? I dont want one already made, i bloody hate stealing other peoples creations..I want to acheive it by my self hopefully with your kindfull help!
GOAL: How can i add dragon platebody into my client? GOAL: How can i add dragon claws into my client? GOAL: How can i get the dragon claws special attack working? (4 Hits Please!)
Thanx! Mostly focus on my "GOALS". Plz help!
Tyvm

item.title: How can i add dragon plate and dragon Claws to a Client?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

For dragon claws try this, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392608.0.html
